title: The Biden-Trump Presidential Debate
content:
BIDEN: Well, look, the greatest economy in the world, he’s the only one who thinks that, I think.
BIDEN: I mean, billionaires in America. And what's happening? They're in a situation.
TRUMP: And by the way, I’m the guy that organized the world against Iran when they had a full-blown ballistic missile attack on Israel.
TRUMP: And frankly, I think it’s important.
BIDEN: You know, when he was president, they were still killing people in Afghanistan.
